Miscellaneous_Payment_RequestObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Miscellaneous_Payment_RequestObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Miscellaneous_Payment_RequestObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Miscellaneous Payment Request

validation.validation: This Miscellaneous Payment Request is not Cancelable.
validation.description: Miscellaneous Payment Request should be either in Draft or In progress or Approved State. If it is Approved then it should not have been pulled into a non Canceled Settlement Run.

validation.validation: Enter a Miscellaneous Payment Request Reference ID. You need a Miscellaneous Payment Request Reference ID to cancel the miscellaneous payment request.
